title: Three out of 5 consumers think it's normal to exaggerate income on loan applications: Survey
description: A survey by FICO reveals that three out of five Indian consumers believe it is normal to exaggerate income on loan applications. More than half also find it acceptable to falsify insurance claims. This trend poses challenges for banks in accurately assessing risk and managing bad loans.
